name: Anomali STAXX
description: Anomali STAXX integration for IP addresses and hashes

options.name: Anomali STAXX Server URL
options.description: The URL for your STAXX server which should include the schema (i.e., http, https) and port if required

options.name: Username
options.description: The username of the STAXX user you want the integration to authenticate as

options.name: Password
options.description: The password for the provided username you want the integration to authenticate as

options.name: Minimum Severity Level
options.description: The minimum severity level required for indicators to be displayed [low, medium, high, very-high]

options.name: Minimum Confidence Level
options.description: The minimum confidence level required for indicators to be displayed

options.name: Ignore Private IPs
options.description: If set to true, private IPs (RFC 1918 addresses) will not be looked up (includes 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, and 255.255.255.255)
